Package frc.alotobots.library.bling

Class BlingSubsystemConstants

java.lang.Object
frc.alotobots.library.bling.BlingSubsystemConstants
public class BlingSubsystemConstants extends Object
Constants for configuring the robot's LED lighting (Bling) subsystem. Defines settings for LED strips, animations, and colors.
